name: Lepidium bonariense
details: A streak of pain from the temple to the chin, as if the face were cut with a razor. Burning in the throat, roaring in ears. Sensation of a tight girdle around chest, as of a knife piercing theLeft side of head, face, chest, hip to knee, all have lancinating pain.With heart symptoms, numbness and pain in left arm, sensation of sinking in pit of stomach.Affections of breast, heart, lancinating pains.
